<p>
City of Mexico. May 20th <a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?year=1848">1848</a>
</p><p>
Sir
</p><p>
The Secretary of War having informed me by letter of the 20th of April ult. that I have been appointed by the President Assistant Commissary of Subsistence I have the honor to notify you for the information of the war department that I have accepted the appointment.
</p><p>
I am sir very respectfully your obdt. servt.<br/>
<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=jjt" rel="me">T. J. Jackson</a><br/>
1st Lt. 1st Arty
</p><p>
Genl. R. Jones<br/>
Adjt. Genl.
</p>
